name: Rolling Garment Bag 22 inch Carry-On Luggage with Spinner Wheels, Suit Bag Travel Carrier Bag Suitcase for hanging Clothes,Lightweight Check-in Suitcase for Business Trips, Christmas Gifts for Men
short_description: CARRY-ON SIZE ON DEMAND WITH DETACHABLE WHEELS — Our rolling garment bag measures 22×8.66×14.96 inches, is designed to meet carry-on size requirements. To meet most carry-on size requirements, simply remove the detachable wheels. , it instantly transforms into a compliant carry-on suitcase.

DURABLE DACRON FABRIC FOR LASTING STYLE: Crafted from high-quality Dacron fabric, our weekender bag is resistant to wear and tear, ensuring your investment lasts for years to come. It's airline approved, making it the perfect choice for travel with hanging clothes and an integrated suit compartment.

GARMENT COMPARTMENT DESIGN FOR YOUR SUITS: Our rolling suitcase with garment compartment equipped with a hanger fixture, perfect for your suits. This unique feature allows you to hang your clothes in place, keeping them wrinkle-free and well-organized during your travels. Ideal for those convertible garment bag enthusiasts.

EFFORTLESS MANEUVERABILITY ON SPINNER WHEELS: With all four smooth-rolling spinner wheels, you'll experience ultra-smooth mobility. Compared to traditional two-wheel designs, our rolling briefcase is a breeze to push, pull, and navigate through crowded airports and busy streets.

TELESCOPIC HANDLE FOR EASY NAVIGATION: Featuring a sturdy four-stage telescopic handle, you can adjust the height to your preference for comfortable handling and smooth navigation. Say goodbye to heavy lifting with our suit carrier.

PERFECT HOLIDAY & FESTIVAL GIFT: Ideal for Christmas, New Year, birthdays, and more. It’s great for travel lovers or business professionals needing formal wear—its practical carry-on design, wrinkle-free compartment, and durability make it a thoughtful, long-lasting gift.

name: LOVEVOOK Underseat Carry On Luggage Airline Approved, 14 Inch Softside Suitcases with Wheels, Lightweight Spinner Carry on Suitcase with TSA Lock Weekender
short_description: 【Airline Approved&Side Stanley Cup Pocket】 LOVEVOOK carry on luggage rolling underseat bag (14.2"x13.78"x8.3") meets most airlines' size requirements, fitting perfectly under the seat or in the overhead bin. To improve your travel experience, We have made fine adjustments to the side pockets. The side water bottle pockets feature adjustable hooks that can safely hold large bottles and accommodate handle-equipped bottles like the Stanley 40 OZ

【Convenient & Stylish Front Quilted Compartment】Experience hassle-free travel with this luggage's three front compartments, perfect for storing your laptop,power bank,boarding passes,documents,and magazines. Easily access your electronics at security checkpoints without opening the main compartment. Plus, the side bottle pocket provides quick access to your drink,keeping your trip smooth and efficient. The chic front quilted compartment adds a touch of style to your travels.

【Large Capacity & Dry/Wet Separation】This 16-inch carry on suitcase boasts a generous 26L main compartment,ideal for trips ranging from 2 to 3 days. It offers a dedicated section for separating dry and wet items,ensuring everything stays spacious and well-organized. Additionally,internal straps help keep your belongings secure and neatly in place.

【Durable Water-Resistant Fabric & Advanced Security】Crafted from high-quality, water-resistant, and scratch-resistant polyester with easy-to-clean leather accents, this softside suitcase is built to withstand the demands of travel. It features smooth-operating zippers and a TSA-approved lock,providing enhanced security and peace of mind.

【Smooth Rolling&Adjustable Handle】Designed for stability and effortless movement,the large 360° spinner wheels ensure smooth gliding,even when your suitcase is fully packed. Both the wheels and handle undergo strict quality testing. The adjustable handle minimizes wobble,offering easy and reliable mobility.

【Soft Handles & Comfortable Travel Experience】This wheeled suitcase is crafted for effortless travel, featuring soft handles on the top and side for easy carrying of heavier items. Ideal for both travel and short business trips, it includes a padded laptop compartment, ensuring a smooth transition between work and leisure.

product_description: Meet your new travel essential: the Maxlite 5 Rolling Tote. Ultra-lightweight and versatile, it works as a stackable companion to your carry-on or as a compact all-in-one bag for short trips. A roomy interior, quick-access front flap, and multiple pockets keep essentials and electronics organized. Smooth ball-bearing wheels and a rear stacking strap provide hands-free mobility and secure stacking atop larger luggage. Fit-to-Fly tested to fit overhead bins on most major U.S. airlines. Backed by Travelpro’s Limited Lifetime Coverage and 1-year Trusted Companion Promise, covering repairs and shipping for airline or carrier damage.
